explanation: [0-0] A left hand is holding a kiwi fruit placed on a cutting board, with a gap on the board. At the bottom of the screen, there is a gray subtitle: "5-MINUTE CRAFTS".

[0-4] Another right hand holds a fruit knife to cut off one end of the kiwi fruit, uses the knife to remove the cut kiwi fruit from the cutting board, rotates the kiwi fruit with the left hand, cuts off the other end of the kiwi fruit, and uses the knife to remove the cut kiwi fruit from the cutting board.
